item.title: Suggested Readings, Links, Podcasts and other Sundry Items for the Burgeoning Cloud Architect
item.description: Here I present a list of resources I have used or am currently using to further my knowldege in the Application Architecture space with a purposeful focus on Cloud Native development and Distributed Systems design. I would love to hear of other resources, you my reader, may have found useful in your journey in Modern Application design.
